Module C195JavaFXProject
Package controller

Class ApptDetailsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ApptDetailsController
  • public class ApptDetailsController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls the appointment details window. This class and associated window are invoked when the user chooses to open the associated details of a specified appointment.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(Appointment appointment,
                       javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointments)
        This method initializes the appointment details window with the appropriate appointment information. The 'start' and 'end' time columns are formatted, and all columns in each table are set with the passed appointment's information. Lambda: Lambda expressions are used in my methods to set items in the three tables of the window. I used these expressions primarily to shorten the lines of code for readability.
        Parameters:
        appointment - Details shown in form is from this appointment.
        appointments - List of all appointments from database.

      • handleUpdateButton

        private void handleUpdateButton()
        This method opens the update appointment window when the user presses the 'Update' button on the form. This method passes the appointment's information to the update appointment window to be updated.

      • handleDeleteButton

        private void handleDeleteButton()
        This method handles deleting the appointment when the user presses the 'Delete' button. Before deleting, the user is prompted to confirm their action. If the user presses 'OK', the appointment is deleted from the database and the window is closed. If the user presses 'Cancel', the alert is closed and the window remains open.
